13.content: Which one will it be?
13.title: Universe 15-21

choices: the equivalent to her girlfriend in this world
1333.content:
Little was known for James but he traveled to a world were the females of every single species had the body and legs of women. And the shortest ones were 7 ft tall. None of them were slim, they were plushy, muscular, thick, curvy or bimboish... also, their feet were never petite. The shortest ones were like 15 inches long, totally humanoid and a bit wide too.
The Human ones were really overendowed, featuring lips, breasts, butts and feet too big for their bodies.
Men, on the other hand, were not physical affected at all. Except their lack of sapience, the smartest human male in this world had an IQ of 21. So they just focused on being stronger, eating, surviving and breeding.
Due this world had such peculiarity, it stayed on a tribal state. Women of every specie had the ability to stand up and use tools while men were usually competing in fighting like the savage animals they were.
Clothing was never invented and tools and weapons were adapted to each specie needs.
These peculiarities also applied to underseas, birds and insects.
James found himself trapped in this world with just his clothes and his toolbelt facing against.
1333.title: 21 My World >:)

choices: his sisters (one has hit puberty and looks very diferent)
13331.content:
James looked at himself, totally nude and just in front of him. His other self looked at him, his movements were like the ones of an ape, but his eyes show less inteligence than the average primate.

The other James started to attack him so James had to fight himself, his clone sure was stronger than him but he fought like a brainless neandertal and James took this chance to knock him down. Still wondering about his surroundings suddenly looking less urbanized he decided to explore a bit.

He was astonished and a bit scared, he saw some kind of cat faced women which featured furry arms ending in cat paws, their backs were covered in cat fur and even had a tail, he hid himself at such sight because he thought he may could get attacked again, and these girls did had weapons and looked more sly than his other self.

He followed a trail with stealth and caution thinking that it may lead to a civilization. He was not wrong, he found a tribalesque version of his neighborhood, he approached slowly to his house and found.
13331.title: himself?

133311.content:
He knew one of the girls he saw, she was his sister, but she was nude. The other one was unknown to him. The other nude girl had the body of a woman but the face and arms of a teen. Her puffy lips covered 3/4 of her face so James immediatly discarded her as his sister.
Her feet maybe 21 cm long at first sight, pretty wide too. Her boobs were B. Suddenly James become wary but careless, maybe his little sister would be in peril so he yelled her name.
"Katty, keep away from her" he yelled. This made both of his sisters to look at him, they reacted with...

info.brief_description: There is a fifth dimension, and sixth and a seventh and more, now you visit them
info.description:
Your name is James Jackson, you like football, are quite observent, bright and knowlegeable, you have two younger sisters and a girlfriend, your job is fixing anything be it electronic or not, your good with tools, your quite fit, athletic and strong and your basically a normal 21 year old, or at least you were till today, as today you found something, it looked like a cross between a tv remote and a lazer gun,

it seemed harmless so you didn't see anything wrong with pushing those buttons and pulling that triger, only to discover that the divice sends you off into another universe and you are left with nothing more than your quick wits, high knowledge, capentry, mechanic and engineering skills, your reasonably good knowledge of fighting and your the items you were carrying (this must includes a torch, hammer, screw driver, spanner, saw, paper, pencil, wire, circutry and penknife) to survive in what ever hostile enviroment you are placed in...

Each universe can be as crazy as your imagenation allows it, but you have got to set up some basic rules for each one, also try and make each one eather similiar except for a few detials that make big changes or completely different, but keep certain minor elements similiar,

There are 35 universes in total, pocket universes are also allowed,

Here are the rules
Dispitite the rating do not include much sex or similiar things and when do, do not discribe in graphic detail
Each world can have anything in it, it could be a universe ruled by apes or a land where everything is sasague, or even a universe where all fiction is real.
Try and keep Jacks personallity, abilities and charater constent. Don't make him fearless at one point, and then a few chapters later make him a complete wuss.
No one line chapters except option chapters, and don't include to many of them.
No racism or discrimination, WHATS SO EVER!
Sexism is alowed, but eather keep it at either a comical level or don't make it to realistic.
No Gays sexuallity, and that includes girls
No insulting religon
All in all have fun.

Please add
